Best Western®

Best Western hotels offer a welcoming experience among clean and comfortable surroundings, with all the amenities to ensure a restful and productive stay at an exceptional value.

WHAT TO EXPECT AT A BEST WESTERN HOTEL

Our Standards

Preferred Hotel Ratings

Every Best Western meets the high-standard requirements of AAA/CAA: meeting a minimum Two-Diamond or Three-Diamond rating.

Our Standard Services & Amenities at Best Western*

  • Breakfast available to help you get a good start on your day
  • FREE high-speed Internet helps you stay connected to work, friends, and family
  • FREE local calls
  • FREE long distance access
  • Copy & fax services to take care of business even while you're out of the office
  • In-room coffee & tea maker
  • Convenient lobby-computer to print airline boarding passes, maps & more

Best Western is committed to making sure every stay is comfortable to meet your travel needs.

*Amenitites may vary at each BEST WESTERN hotel.
